description: This quick vegan meatball curry couldn't be simpler to whip up for a meat-free feast.
keywords: Indian curry,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Plant-based,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Plant Based Meatball Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large capsicums, red and green, cored and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the meatballs, stirring often, for 5 minutes until browned all over. Remove and set aside. Add the rest of the oil, onions and capsicums and cook for 6-7 minutes.

Stir in the garlic and ginger and cook for 1 minute. Stir in the curry paste and cook for 1 minute. Pour over the chopped tomatoes and half a tin of water, bring to the boil, reduce the heat, add the meatballs back into the pan and simmer for 5 minutes, until the sauce has thickened.
Serve with chopped coriander on top and lime wedges on the side.
